page.title: 16SHOPPING IN DYCE - 1
page.content: There are 2 main areas foor shopping in Dyce - {1. ASDA SHOPPING CENTRE { 2. VICTORIA STREET} We did a survey to find out why people used each of these. {______________________________________ {1. ASDA -}many people from Dyce and from other towns shop at Asda. Most people said they liked shopping in the super-store because the prices were reasonable and the staff were friendly. 72% of people we interviewed agreed about these points. Most people liked shopping there because you can buy all of your main needs in one place. The Asda shopping centre also contains smaller shops such as a chemists, a fish shop, travel agent and a record shop.{ {______________________________________ Page 16 has details on VICTORIA STREET
